about_the_game:
Step into the world of Snow Resort Simulator. Tackle daily responsibilities: upgrade facilities, maintain a cozy resort, satisfy guests with freshly cooked meals and drinks, and keep your inventory fully stocked. Be prepared for the challenges that come with winter.

Ensure you prepare tickets according to customer requests. Sell tickets to customers who want to ski. Use the income to improve your resort and restock supplies.

Customers will visit your shop to have damaged items fixed and buy new equipment. Repair ski equipment according to customer needs to help them out. Use the income to upgrade your shop, which will allow you to provide more services.

To operate the café efficiently and increase your profits, respond quickly and accurately to customer orders. Prepare and deliver food according to customer preferences. Clear the tables to make space for new customers. Ensure all equipment is functional. Upgrade your café, buy new equipment, and tables to serve more customers.

Expand the hotel to have new rooms and rent them out. After guests check out, clean and tidy up the rooms. New customers will not want to stay because of messy rooms.

Keep your inventory stocked to provide continuous service to customers. Remember that running out of stock during peak hours could cause issues. Regularly check inventory and place new orders before supplies run out. Invest in the right products according to your needs.
detailed_description:
Feature List

  • Ski Equipment Repair: Keep your customers' snowboards and skis in pristine condition with our expert repair services.

  • Ski Pass Sales: Offer a variety of ski passes to cater to different visitor needs and budgets.

  • Fully Stocked Store: Equip your customers for the slopes with a wide selection of stylish apparel and high-quality gear.

  • Resort Customization: Design and build the resort of your dreams, from luxurious lodges to thrilling ski runs.

  • Comfortable Accommodations: Provide comfortable and convenient hotel rooms for your guests to relax and recharge.

  • On-Site Dining: Delight your visitors with delicious meals and refreshments throughout their stay.

  • Lost & Found Services: At night, find your guests' lost equipment before they leave the resort.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3.0 GHz or Ryzen 3xxx
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 960 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (recent generation)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1070 or better 6GB VRAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
